text: Video chat is a way of communicating online using the Internet. It uses a camera and microphone in a computer or smart phone. This allows people to see and hear each other. For streaming video a speed of at least 2 Mbps is needed, to prevent a choppy signal and disconnects. For sound transmission, much less speed is required, so people often turn off video when the internet connection is slow. Video chat is a very popular form of communication in the 21st century. It is often used for many reasons; * To communicate with family or friends * Real time business communication * Real time education / teaching There are various software packages that make this possible. *Skype *Discord *Zoom *BlueJeans Category:Telecommunications
title: Video chat
